name: 3dMaskToASCII
author: AFNI Developers
description: Converts a byte-valued 0/1 dataset into an ASCII string, or vice versa.

inputs.description: Read ASCII mask, expand it to byte-valued dataset, and write to stdout.
inputs.name: To binary flag

output-files.description: Output file where ASCII string mask or binary mask will be written.
output-files.name: Output file
